text: How do we get across, Anne?

Yeah, what's your
Anne-tuition telling ya?
Hm. Well, how about

we build a bridge
out of ourselves!
I saw it in a movie once.

All these tiny mice
worked together

to steal some oregano
from a French restaurant.

Uh, you heard the commander,
everyone. Hop to it.
All: Hop-hop-hop-hop-hop-hop.

- ( gasping )
- All right, everyone.

Now lean forward
into the canyon.

Nice. Did you measure
the width of the canyon?

- No. Why?
- ( screaming )
Guys! Hang on.
Grab on.
( screaming )

Anyone one else think
this is going poorly?

We're usually a bit
more coordinated than this.

Okay. I think
it's clear right now

I shouldn't be leading
this expedition.

Sasha, will you please just take
command and tell us what to do?
No! You need to be in charge.

What? What do you mean?
I'm drowning out here, dude.
Do you want me to fail?

Is that what this is?
Some kind of new manipulation?
No! I just-- I--

We're also usually
a lot quieter than this.

- All: Aah!
- Everyone, attack!

- What kind of attack?
- Just whatever feels right!
( screaming )
Yeah-yuh!

- Oof.
- Aah!

- Hop-Pop: Aah!
- What happened?
I got a grass stain on my pants!

Oh, I have Mrs. B's
stain remover pen.
Soak it in water first.
Aah!
No! Sasha, what do we do?

Uh, you're in charge.
Whatever you think is best.
You've got this.

But I don't know
what I'm doing.
Please, just take over.

- I-- I can't.
- Why not?

Because the last time
I was in charge,
I ruined our friendship.
( screams )
What-- what are you doing?

Putting my faith
in a real commander.
What the heck, Boonchuy?

Great.
Now how will we get out?

- ( roaring )
- ( Sasha grunting )

Frogs of the resistance,
execute maneuver three.

- ( grunting )
- Maneuver what?

- Now inflate.
- ( all croaking )
( coughing )

- Sasha, you did it!
- Not yet.

Wally, Croaker, Loggle,
mirror punch.

- Yeah!
- What's the plan now?

Don't look at me.
You're wearing the helmet.
Loggle, you're on bridge duty.
Croaker and Wally are lookouts.

Anne, Plantars, you know
what to do with these.

All right,
let's mess this place up.
